tutorial available here https //www youtube com/watch v=o-d089u7llm in kvetching you ll cast on provisional stitches for the thumb opening and then continue working down towards the cuff black arrows later you ll pick up and work the opposite side of these provisional sts and work up towards the tip of the thumb pink arrows note the ½-stitch shift between black and pink arrows because of this shift you ll pick up one fewer stitch than you cast on this leaves a one-legged half stitch on each end these one-legged stitches create a vexing conundrum if you knit them they widen and distort creating holes if you don t knit them they leave even larger holes fortunately this conundrum can be resolved by ignoring the one-legged stitches until after the finger is worked at which point they become a key player in grafting the holes closed 6 road trip knits closing finger holes jeny s video tutorial is available at https //youtu be/o-d089u7llm 6 02 the setup the one-legged stitches at the
